author: mmusich
body:
backport of #38481

#### PR description:

It was noticed by shifters that in the [pclSpy](https://cms-conddb-prod.cern.ch/pclSpy/app/workflow?runClass=Collisions22) the `SiPixelLA_pcl` and `SiStripBadStripRcdHitEff_pcl` keep being updated even if other tracker worfklows are not (e.g. because the tracker is not in Global DAQ or the HV is not ON). This happens because in both cases, even if either the payload is identical to the one on the last open IOV (in the Lorentz Angle case) or if there are no valid counts to extract a hit efficiency measurement, some "null" payloads are uploaded anyway (see e.g. [LA tag](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/tags/SiPixelLorentzAngle_byPCL_v0_prompt) and [BadComponents from hit efficiency tag](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/tags/SiStripBadChannel_FromHitEfficiency_v0_prompt)). This can cause some confusion to non-expert eyes. This PR solves the issue - as well as removing the minimal DB overhead of dealing with unnecessary uploads.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles, run successfully unit tests as well as `runTheMatrix.py -l 1001.0,1001.2 -t 4 -j 8`
